title: Sienna Miller pays homage to the Seventies in a shaggy fur coat in Gucci's S/S 2020 advert
text:
She's made a name for herself as a fashion icon.

So it came as no surprise to see Sienna Miller starring in Gucci Cruise 2020 #ComeAsYouAre_RSVP ad campaign, which also features the likes of Iggy Pop and Gucci Mane.

The 37-year-old actress looked radiant in the images as she donned a Dynasty-inspired look for the clip, which saw her dancing and laughing away at a raucous house party.

One to watch: Sienna Miller stars in Gucci Cruise 2020 #ComeAsYouAre_RSVP ad campaign, which also features the likes of Iggy Pop and Gucci Mane

Sienna paid homage to the Seventies in a shaggy cream and tan jacket that shrouded her lithe frame.

The American Sniper star wore her glossy golden locks in loose retro waves that framed her pretty features, and completed the look with a slick of glossy red lipstick on her plump pout.

Gucci are famed for their quirky and eye-catching campaign videos, with the Cruise 2020 advert designed to showcase 'Inclusive uninhibited hedonism culminates in a party at a Roman villa with diverse characters as guests, epitomizing Gucci’s spirit'.

Loving life: The 37-year-old actress looked radiant in the images as she donned a Dynasty-inspired look for the clip, which saw her dancing and laughing away at a raucous house party

Dynasty darling: Sienna paid homage to the Seventies in a shaggy cream and tan jacket that shrouded her lithe frame

Speaking about filming the advert, Sienna told Vogue magazine: 'The entire thing was just a wild experience. There was this vast array of different people of ages, shapes, and sizes, and it was just raucous.

'I think I found myself crouched on the floor, laughing hysterically, about 10 times. It was that much fun.'

Sienna, who established herself as a boho style icon during the Nineties, said of her own personal style: 'I've always been drawn to fashion that's nostalgic.

'I used to think that after the '90s, there wasn't really an original moment in fashion—everything almost felt like a rehash of what had been done in the past, and that's probably why I love vintage clothes so much.'

Famous faces: Gucci Mane also appears in the clip and can be seen stripping down to a towel and getting a massage during one of the frames

Finally happened: Fans have long been calling for Gucci Mane to star in a Gucci campaign seeing as they share the same name

Iconic: Iggy Pop also appears in the clip looking in high spirits and chatting with co-stars whilst typically shirtless and adorned in gold chains

Quirky: The advert is designed to showcase 'Inclusive uninhibited hedonism culminates in a party at a Roman villa with diverse characters as guests, epitomizing Gucci’s spirit'

Meanwhile, in a new interview with ELLE UK, the actress got candid about her 'unconventional' relationship with ex Tom Sturridge, 33, and also opened up about the 'bad timing' of her romance with Jude Law, 46.

The blonde beauty said of her time with her former fiancé Jude: ‘I fell in love with someone very famous and that became the story – it was bad timing.





'I had an amazing time, but it would have been nice if that hadn’t happened before I was known for something else. It was a battle to be seen as something else.’

Candid: During her interview with ELLE UK, the New York-born, London-raised American Sniper star also spoke about her on-off relationship with Jude Law (pictured in May 2010)

Their romance began in 2003 and, following a long break, came to its ultimate end at the start of 2011.

She also revealed her ex Tom sleeps over at her house, as part of their efforts to raise their seven-year-old daughter Marlowe together.

Sienna told the magazine: 'He’s at the house and he’s going to stay there tonight. It’s not like there’s a structure for custody. We make it work. It’s not conventional.’

The former couple first started dating in 2011, but their romance came to an end in 2015. Sienna has since referred to the actor as her 'best friend'.
